title: Kha'zix
body: So I have been maining kha for nearly a year now and I can do so well in the early game get ahead and stuff and everyone says he I such a strong late gamer but I can't seem to stay ahead when it comes to late game. In team fights I stay back and wait for picks but I just fall behind I can't take him into ranked because of this reason is there anyone that mains him and can help me figure out what I am doing wrong in the late game

replies.body: Kha zix is like Zed but with 99% more risk, if you try and isolate an adc but don't kill him/her and you do not have any summoners then boom your dead, with zed you can escape with your shadows :P. Playing as kha zix, I like to splitpush despite kha zix not being a great splitpusher because he can demolish anyone IF fed.
How is Zed more risky than Khazix? Zed is the safest assassin to play and has an easy escape if it you fail to assassinate.

Zed is like kha zix but with 99% less risk*

My advice is that you target vital targets in teamfights and try to stalk the ADC waiting for a good opportunity to pounce where you know you can make it count. Even if you die, killing the enemy adc can turn the game around.
